properties.name: dumont.allowedOrigins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for CORS configuration.

properties.name: dumont.cron
properties.description: Cron expression to schedule job execution.

properties.name: dumont.cron.zone
properties.description: Timezone used for cron expression evaluation.

properties.name: dumont.dependencies.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable dependency resolution during processing.

properties.name: dumont.indexing.provider
properties.description: The indexing provider to use for content indexing (e.g. turing, solr, turing).

properties.name: dumont.job.size
properties.description: Maximum number of items to process per job execution.

properties.name: dumont.reactive.indexing
properties.description: Enable or disable reactive indexing mode for asynchronous processing.

properties.name: dumont.scheduler.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the scheduled job execution.

properties.name: turing.api-key
properties.description: API key for authenticating with the Turing platform.

properties.name: turing.solr.endpoint
properties.description: Solr endpoint URL used by the Turing integration.

properties.name: turing.url
properties.description: Base URL of the Turing platform API.
